title: Pajama Party
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Thank you for tagging along with my selfish request, Karin-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>You can ask me more if it’s for something like this. Your pajama party is fun, Riko-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Wearing your favorite pajama, talking until late at night while drinking tea and eating sweets.... It’s the best, right! Ah, would you like another cup of tea?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Sure, thank-.... My, your hands are so pretty, Riko-chan. Is it because you play the piano? You have long and slender fingers.... You take good care of them, huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Eeh!? I-, is that so? Take good care.... My piano teacher told me to, so it has become a habit of mine. But I don’t think they’re particularly pretty, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>May I? Hmm, smooth. It’s good that maintaining them has become a habit for you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I.... actually have wanted to do nail arts....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I always keep my nails short because I play the piano, but sometimes I wish I could do nail arts<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, that’s my specialty. Nowadays, there are nail art stickers on the market. You can just stick them to your nails. They’re also easy to remove, so I think they’re perfect for you, Riko-chan. Should we go and buy them tomorrow?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Really!? I’m so happy! Thank you, Karin-san!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
